oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Baptist Convention Center Under Construction, c.1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the Southern Baptist Convention Center building, located at 406 James Robertson Parkway, under construction in approximately 1962. Designed by the architectural firm Hart, Freeland & Roberts, the building was completed in 1963. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.); Southern Baptist Convention. Sunday School Board;
